pages.text: Groenlandaspis is a rare example of a fossil that gives us insight into the coloration of the animal when it lived. Because of this, we know that Groenlandaspis was rusty red on the top with a countershade of white. In life, it probably was a benthic feeder, swimming along the seafloor.
